I.T. / Data Management Specialist Job at Nabuyar Environmental Consultants Limited




        
    

        
        Nabuyar Environmental Consultants Limited is a consultancy firm concerned withEnvironmental Sanitation, Pest & Vector Control, System Development & Management, Capacity Building & System, Strengthening for food safety & environmental Health Response, Environmental Hazard Prevention & Control, Environmental impact assessment, environmental auditing, Restoration work, Renovation, Energy, Engineering Installations, Urban structure, Events Management, engineering and architecture, landscape infrastructure, hydraulics & environment, telecoms trading, sales and distribution of general goods & general contractors.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: I.T. / Data Management Specialist
     

            
    



Job Location: Garki, Abuja (FCT) 
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Responsible for maintaining telecommunication and web systems
	Support of legacy desktops, laptops and servers
	Evaluate new hardware and software to meet company requirements
	Maintain inventory of internal licenses and track compliance
	Design and manage forms/software for data collection and management
	Provide technical advice and assistance to office staff as needed
	Monitor or optimize the performance, security, backup, and recovery of the database
	Develop policies and procedures concerning the database: data entry and sharing information with others
	Use available technology to promote the website and gather statistical information for analysis
	Plan, develop, and manage all IT services, programs, and support throughout the enterprise.


Requirements


	Bachelor's Degree in Information Technology or a related field
	At least 2 years of practical experience in database administration, development, and web design
	A technical degree in information science, CS, or equivalent skill gained through experience coupled with 2+ years of experience in systems (hardware and software) support
	Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
	Ability to manage multiple assignments and meet deadlines
	Ability to work occasional off-hours duty to permit timely attention to mission-critical functions
	Effective attention to detail and a high degree of accuracy.
	Strong organizational and time management Skills
	Self-Motivation and the ability to take initiative and multitask.


Salary
N120,000 - N150,000 / month.
